description.value: The effects of the smoke created by an alchemist's bomb can duplicate the effects of @Compendium[pf1.spells.kjke96zd1j1jz48z]{Stinking Cloud} instead of @Compendium[pf1.spells.g33euis7yi9pwddy]{Fog Cloud}, filling an area equal to twice the bomb's splash radius for 1 round. An alchemist must possess the smoke bomb discovery before selecting this discovery.
